name: Brook and Branch
text:
Perfect for those seeking organic growth.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, May 2023.

name: E.T.C.
text: The power of the Horde radiates through this card back! Earnable on the Festival of Legends reward track.

name: Halveria
text: Her guitar is called Sorrowchord, and it gently weeps on itself. Earnable after purchasing the Festival of Legends Tavern Pass.

name: Festival
text: This card back speaks volumes! Earnable on the Festival of Legends reward track.
